About the Company: Godrej Consumer Products Ltd (GCPL) is a leader among Indias Fast Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) companies, with leading Household and Personal Care Products.The company`s product range includes Soaps and Talc- It has created brands like Cinthol, Fair Glow, Evita, and Vigil.Hair Care- Under this it has introduced various hair colour products such Colour Soft, Anoop, Renew, Godrej Expert and Kesh Kala.Household and Fabric Care- In this segment it has introduced products like Godrej Dish wash, Glossy and Ezee.The company has also acquired Brian Boyce and Vicki Dryden Wyatt Keyline Brands namely Cuticura, Aapri, Erasmic, Inecto and Nulon.
